metadata.title: CVE-2020-21676 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A stack-based buffer overflow in the genpstrx_text() component ingenpstricks.c of fig2dev 3.2.7b allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (DOS) via converting a xfig file into pstricks format.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21676` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.7a-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.7a-7ubuntu0.1').
